relevant_communication: Track and Trace Your Pensions In Europe (TTYPE)
goals__remit: PKA administrates pensions for app. 300.000 members in Denmark. The members primarily work within the healthcare sector. PKA is a jointly owned administration company for four pension funds. As well as aiming to create member value PKA also invests in projects and assets, which have high environmental, social and governance standards.
